title: Davis-Black Box&Other Psychic Generators(1987)
description:
This is W.E. Davis&#039; amazing book The Black Box and Other Psychic Generators (1987) which details psychic experiments and demonstrations you can do on your own and then provides you with the construction plans for building a radionic psionic device of your own. It also touches upon ancient mysteries and civilization, suppressed science, telepathy, electromagnetics, anti-matter, psychic phenomena, Kirlian photography, radionics, psionics, psychic warfare and much more. There is also a section on CIA mind reading, brain functioning, television, ESP, Telekinesis, time travel theory, thought implantation, pyramid power, rain making, and an explanation of what the life force or "soul" consists of.  Find out about how to construct your own Heironymous machines and make experiments in the fascinating field of radionics. Multitudes of wonderful discoveries remain hidden from the general population and will doubtlessly remain so as long as humanity supports the greed and fear based social system that we live in. 120 pages, many pictures. A must read for everyone.

More info: http://www.honesty.org
